message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.NE

This paper deals with the segmentation of colorectal cancerous regions from MR images using deep learning methods. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel multi-task framework for RoI localization and intra-RoI segmentation, which involves designing a loss function for multi-task learning. This suggests that the paper could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper deals with medical images, which could place it in cs.MM (Multimedia) or cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
